document.full_text: general motors co is recalling more than 4,500 chevrolet colorado and gmc canyon pickup trucks because nuts in the windshield wipers may not have been sufficiently tightened.
document.title: gm recalls pickup trucks due to wiper defect
lines_and_colors: general motors co is recalling more than 4,500 chevrolet colorado and gmc canyon pickup trucks because nuts in the windshield wipers may not have been sufficiently tightened.
